resources.string: To add a translation press the middle button. Each press will translate once; please translate multiple times
Click on a row to see (and maybe retranslate!) a previous mangled quotations; swipe right to delete
Unable to download language models; check for internet connection (only need to download first time you use app) and permission and restart app
App doesn\'t have permission to access Internet; will use cached or backup quote

Betty Botter bought some butter But she said the butter’s bitter If I put it in my batter, it will make my batter bitter But a bit of better butter will make my batter better So ‘twas better Betty Botter bought a bit of better butter
Downloading…This may take a few minutes the first time you run the program. If no progress after a minute, check internet connection and restart
